problem.problem_statement: How do wildflower meadows in cities help the environment?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

problem.problem_statement: How can we effectively manage protected marine areas?
problem.goalTitle: Conserve and sustainably use the oceans, seas and marine resources for sustainable development

problem.problem_statement: How can using fire-resistant materials reduce wildfire damage?
problem.goalTitle: Make cities and human settlements inclusive, safe, resilient and sustainable

problem.problem_statement: How can we use the knowledge of indigenous people to help save forests?
problem.goalTitle: Strengthen the means of implementation and revitalize the Global Partnership for Sustainable Development

problem.problem_statement: How can we use technology to keep bees safe?
problem.goalTitle: Build resilient infrastructure, promote inclusive and sustainable industrialization and foster innovation
